snippet: A Chinese government spokesman called for an immediate cease-fire between Myanmar government troops and ethnic Kachin rebels.
abstract: Chinese government spokesman calls for immediate cease-fire between Myanmar government troops and ethnic Kachin rebels after shell, apparently from conflict, lands in Chinese territory.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese government spokesman called for an immediate cease-fire between Myanmar government troops and ethnic Kachin rebels.

headline.seo: China Objects After Shell Is Fired From Myanmar
headline.main: Shellfire From Myanmar Enters China, Drawing a Rebuke
headline.print_headline: Shellfire From Myanmar Enters China, Drawing a Rebuke
